name: Blue Flashes
description:
We were about to drift off to sleep. 

Until I started seeing them. 

Blue flashes all over the room. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Click to progress.
